mapper.sql: id, sub_order_id, attr_id, attr_path, text_input, attr_value_id
mapper.select: select ifnull(a.endMeter, "") as "endMeter", ifnull(date_format(a.lastDate, '%Y%m%d'), 0) as "lastDate", ifnull(date_format(b.begin_time, '%Y%m%d'), 0) as "begin_time", ifnull(b.water_meter, "") as "water_meter" from yc_agreement_tab b left join yc_wegcost_tab a on b.father_id=a.agerId and a.`type`=11 and a.lastDate is not null where b.id=#{rentalLeaseOrderId} order by a.lastDate desc limit 1

select ifnull(a.endMeter, "") as "endMeter", ifnull(date_format(a.lastDate, '%Y%m%d'), 0) as "lastDate", ifnull(date_format(b.begin_time, '%Y%m%d'), 0) as "begin_time", ifnull(b.electricity_meter, "") as "electricity_meter" from yc_agreement_tab b left join yc_wegcost_tab a on b.father_id=a.agerId and a.`type`=12 and a.lastDate is not null where b.id=#{rentalLeaseOrderId} order by a.lastDate desc limit 1

select ifnull(a.endMeter, "") as "endMeter", ifnull(date_format(a.lastDate, '%Y%m%d'), 0) as "lastDate", ifnull(date_format(b.begin_time, '%Y%m%d'), 0) as "begin_time", ifnull(b.gas_meter, "") as "gas_meter" from yc_agreement_tab b left join yc_wegcost_tab a on b.father_id=a.agerId and a.`type`=13 and a.lastDate is not null where b.id=#{rentalLeaseOrderId} order by a.lastDate desc limit 1

select electriccard, ifnull(electricity_meter, "") as "electricity_meter", electricity_meter_h, electricity_meter_l, watercard, ifnull(water_meter, "") as "water_meter", gascard, ifnull(gas_meter, "") as "gas_meter" from yc_agreement_tab where id=#{rentalLeaseOrderId}

select a.id, a.sub_order_id, a.attr_id, a.attr_path, a.text_input, a.attr_value_id , b.type attr_type from cancel_lease_order_value a left join attr b on a.attr_id = b.id where sub_order_id = #{subOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into cancel_lease_order_value
ID,
sub_order_id,
attr_id,
attr_path,
text_input,
attr_value_id,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{subOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{attrId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{attrPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{textInput,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attrValueId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update cancel_lease_order_value
sub_order_id = #{subOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
attr_id = #{attrId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
attr_path = #{attrPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
text_input = #{textInput,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attr_value_id = #{attrValueId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cancel_lease_order_value set sub_order_id = #{subOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, attr_id = #{attrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, attr_path = #{attrPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, text_input = #{textInput,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attr_value_id = #{attrValueId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
